AuditDomain.name: Cable Management
AuditDomain.description: All cables defined in the CMDB

AuditCategory.name: Front end Cable Management
AuditCategory.description: Set of audit rules related to front end cables

AuditRule.name: Front end Cable is connected to only one network socket
AuditRule.description: Only one end of the cable is attached to a network socket
AuditRule.query: SELECT FrontEndNetworkCable AS nc WHERE (nc.networksocket1_id != 0) AND (nc.networksocket2_id != 0)

AuditCategory.name: Back end Cable Management
AuditCategory.description: Set of audit rules related to back end cables

AuditRule.name: Back end Cable is connected to only one network socket
AuditRule.description: Only one end of the cable is attached to a network socket
AuditRule.query: SELECT BackEndNetworkCable AS nc WHERE (nc.backendsocket1_id != 0) AND (nc.backendsocket2_id != 0)

AuditCategory.name: Device Cable Management
AuditCategory.description: Set of audit rules related to device cables

AuditRule.name: Device Cable is connected to only one network socket
AuditRule.description: Only one end of the cable is attached to a network socket or the physical interface of a connectable CI
AuditRule.query: SELECT DeviceNetworkCable AS nc WHERE (nc.networksocket_id != 0) AND (nc.physicalinterface_id != 0)

AuditCategory.name: Direct Cable Management
AuditCategory.description: Set of audit rules related to direct cables

AuditRule.name: Direct Cable is connected to only one physical interface
AuditRule.description: Only one end of the cable is attached to the physical interface of a connectable CI
AuditRule.query: SELECT DirectNetworkCable AS nc WHERE (nc.physicalinterface1_id != 0) AND (nc.physicalinterface2_id != 0)
